Information: Notch signaling promotes proliferative signaling during neurogenesis, and its activity is inhibited by Numb to promote neural differentiation. It plays a major role in the regulation of embryonic development.

glucocorticoids are a class of steroid hormones.regulates genes controlling the development, metabolism, and immune response. They are important in arousal and cognition.Glucocorticoids act on the hippocampus, amygdala, and frontal lobes.

Information: HOX genes specify regions of the body plan along the head-tail axis.Essential for the establishment of regionalized neuronal identity.
